arm_group.description: Patients with record of using bisphosphonate medication

brief_summary.textblock:
Dose and duration of bisphosphonate therapy will increase the likelihood that patients
      experience delayed healing of non-union fractures.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Risk for Radiographic and Clinical Nonunion in Patients With Previous Bisphosphonates Therapy.

detailed_description.textblock:
We intend to review the UWHealth patient database to identify individuals with delayed or
      nonunion fractures.  Subsequently, we will collect associated medical information related to
      fractures such as age of osteoporosis diagnosis, BMI, previous bisphosphonate treatment,
      type and location of fracture, time to complete union, other treatment needed for nonunion
      etc. With this information, we will evaluate the risk of delayed and nonunion fractures in
      patients previously receiving bisphosphonate treatment compared to a normal population. We
      also will investigate other potential causes of delayed or nonunion fractures in this
      population.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Men and women older than 60 years old with delayed or nonunion low trauma fracture
             between 01/01/2000 - 12/31/2011.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  None

study_pop.textblock:
Men and women older than 60 years old with delayed or nonunion low trauma fracture beween
        01/01/2000 - 12/31/2011.

clinical_study.keyword: osteoporosis, low trauma fracture, non-union fracture, delayed healing fracture, bisphosphonate
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Risk for Radiographic and Clinical Nonunion in Patients With Previous Bisphosphonates Therapy.

primary_outcome.description: This variable will be generated by reviewing diagnosis codes from patients seen at the University of Wisconsin Hospital and Clinics during the time period identified above.
primary_outcome.measure: The number of patients with delayed healing or non-union fractures with prior bisphosphonate use

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Patients with non-union or delayed healing fractures obtaining care at the University of Wisconsin Hospital or Clinics will have a medical record review conducted.
secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of patient variables (demographic or medical history) related to non-union or delayed healing fractures.
